v-model:active.description: Whether to activate the action menu
v-model:active.description_zh: Whether to activate the action menu

drag.description: Drag component props, for deep customization (support direction attraction boundary)
drag.description_zh: Drag component props, for deep customization (support direction attraction boundary)

type.description: type, optional values are default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: type, optional values are default primary info success warning danger

position.description: trigger position, optional values are left-top right-top left-bottom right-bottom
position.description_zh: trigger position, optional values are left-top right-top left-bottom right-bottom

direction.description: Action menu popup direction, optional values are top bottom left right
direction.description_zh: Action menu popup direction, optional values are top bottom left right

fixed.description: Whether to use fixed positioning, set to false to enable absolute positioning (absolute positioning prohibited from dragging)
fixed.description_zh: Whether to use fixed positioning, set to false to enable absolute positioning (absolute positioning prohibited from dragging)

z-index.description: Same as css z-index, used for custom trigger level
z-index.description_zh: Same as css z-index, used for custom trigger level

top.description: Same as css top, for custom trigger position
top.description_zh: Same as css top, for custom trigger position

bottom.description: Same as css bottom, for custom trigger position
bottom.description_zh: Same as css bottom, for custom trigger position

left.description: Same as css left, for custom trigger position
left.description_zh: Same as css left, for custom trigger position

right.description: Same as css right, for custom trigger position
right.description_zh: Same as css right, for custom trigger position

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation

teleport.description: element to which the component mounts
teleport.description_zh: element to which the component mounts

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the trigger is clicked, not triggered when disabled state is true
events.description_zh: Triggered when the trigger is clicked, not triggered when disabled state is true

events.name: open
events.description: Fires when the action menu is activated and opened
events.description_zh: Fires when the action menu is activated and opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Fires at the end of the animation that activates and opens the action menu
events.description_zh: Fires at the end of the animation that activates and opens the action menu

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the action menu is deactivated and closed
events.description_zh: Triggered when the action menu is deactivated and closed

events.name: closed
events.description: Fires when the animation of inactivating and closing the action menu ends
events.description_zh: Fires when the animation of inactivating and closing the action menu ends
